Titles.eng: The Garden of Sinners: Paradox Spiral
Titles.jpn: 劇場版「空の境界」第五章 矛盾螺旋

Summaries.eng: In mid-October 1998, Enjou Tomoe is attacked by several bullies from his school, until Ryougi Shiki appears and saves him. She decides to give him a place to hide after learning that she has apparently murdered someone. But several days after the incident, there is no sign that the alleged murder has taken place.
Summaries.jpn: 1998年10月中旬、円城友江は学校から数人のいじめっ子に襲われ、涼木式が現れて彼を救う。 彼女は、彼が明らかに誰かを殺害したことを知った後、彼に隠れ場所を与えることにしました。 しかし、事件の数日後、殺人容疑が起こったという兆候はありません。

Aliases: Gekijô ban Kara no kyôkai: Dai go shô - Mujun rasen
The Garden of Sinners - Chapter 5: Paradox Spiral
Kara no Kyoukai: The Garden of Sinners - Paradox Spiral
